Work experience and career Journey

10/2021 - Now

Product designer at Atlassian

Product designer within an engineering team focusing on data and stability of data within the company. Working closely with engineers to find solutions to complex problems with design thinking methods.

08/2021 - 10/2021

Product designer and Product owner at PatientZero

Product owner and UIX designer in a SASS company that solves business problems with design and workshopping, running agile and scrum frameworks within the team.

01/2021 - 08/2021

UIX engineer at WorkingMouse

UIX designer and basic front-end developer role in a company that provides high quality websites and applications to clients. Working on a shared library that has standardised components across multiple platform.

05/2018 - 01/2021

UIX designer at WorkingMouse

UIX designer role working with clients to create and design business solutions and products. Designing accessible and cross platform screens.

10/2017 - 05/2018

Graduate developer at Canstar

Graduate role in a financial data company that requires both back-end and front-end skill sets.

05/2017 - 08/2017

Multimedia internship at Crowd Delivery

Paid internship working in a multimedia role producing print, social and video content.

02/2015 - 04/2017

Casual employee at The University of Queensland

Part time employment involving contacting university students. Responsible for collecting data and addressing potential issues students undergo and how to prevent them.

01/2015 - 03/2016

Visual designer (work experience) at The University of Queensland

Work experience working in multimedia content such as vector art, flyers, posters, flash animation and social content.
